summary: Successfully tested emoji-to-SVG icon replacement across entire umiri.me app. All 8 custom mood icons implemented correctly with professional design matching soft organic theme. Calendar empty cell background bug confirmed fixed.

design_issues.issue: Template shows 0 SVG icons, may still be using emoji for this specific template

passed_tests: Landing page - 8 custom SVG mood icons in strip
Mood Entry - 8 custom SVG icons in grid layout
Selected mood - Icon + note input area display correctly
Dashboard - Custom SVG icon for today's mood
Dashboard - Recent moods show custom SVG icons
Calendar - Custom SVG icons on days with entries
Calendar - Empty cells have NO green background (bug fixed)
Calendar - Legend shows 8 custom SVG icons
Share Card - Custom SVG icons in most templates
All mood CRUD operations working correctly
